traits.christology: veiled suffering messiah; divine son revealed at baptism and cross
traits.resurrection: empty tomb with angelic message; earliest manuscripts end without appearances

traits.birth_narrative: birth in Bethlehem, visit of magi, Herod's persecution and flight to Egypt
traits.christology: Davidic messiah and Emmanuel fulfilling Scripture
traits.resurrection: empty tomb with angel and commissioned appearances in Galilee

traits.christology: crucified and risen Lord; sometimes preexistent and cosmic
traits.resurrection: appearances to witnesses including Paul; foundation of salvation
